introduction: GREY HOUSE is a Yugoslav TV drama series written by Goran Mihić, directed by Darko Bajić, and produced by Television Beograd. It premiered on Yugoslav Radio-Television (JRT) in 1986. It follows the life of children and youngsters confined to a reform institution for juvenile delinquents which, for many of them, is the only home they’ve ever known. Over twelve episodes, it investigates complex relations between young people who are on or have stepped past the verge of criminality, as well as between them and their caretakers, revealing their difficult life stories and hard destinies.源自：https://tickets.sff.ba/films/2265
